title: Can I write a blog on a scientist biography using other books? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes, you can write Blog on scientist biography provided you enjoy writing about scientist without expecting many people to read at early. In your initial days of blogging it's very hard to get traffic. It takes between 3–6 months to for Google to know that your blog or site is online, only after that it refers people to your place. But this doesn't mean you don't have work to do. You can write through books and get Knowledge through other sources like podcasts, documentaries, interviews etc. To conclude - Have patience for atleast 6 months and keep making yourself more familiar with your niche and blogging best practices. You can blog about pretty much anything provided you have interest in it and please make sure that when you write blog, you write as one on one perspective. Read about your niche and get Knowledge on it. I suggest if you want to blog. Don't have second thoughts. Just buy domain and hosting and make your WordPress website. Important tip - There is market for everything. You make your content interactive and educating and have patience. If you do good work, you will be appreciated. Thanks

Blogging is all about developing a valuable content which attract crowd of people and develop the interest of users. Book was created by other person, probably it has a copyright protection, so when you use some parts of this book, you violate a copyright law. To avoid any copyright, notify the author of the book about your intention to use their materials and ask them for permission. Don’t forget to credit the original source!
